original_title: RAY, GOODMAN & BROWN: LIVE IN CONCERT
overview: Ray, Goodman & Brown -- a soul trio made up of vocalists Harry Ray, Al Goodman and Billy Brown, who first found fame as the Moments in the early 1970s -- rekindle the magic of their R&B sound in this 2006 concert with new member Kevin Owens, who replaced the late Ray after his death in 1992. Tracks include "Love on a Two-Way Street," "Special Lady," "Look at Me (I'm in Love)" and "Sexy Mama."
title: RAY, GOODMAN & BROWN: LIVE IN CONCERT
